recipesJson.name: 1-2-3 Van the Man
recipesJson.author: Deweysuds
recipesJson.description:
I enjoyed the idea of a 1-2-3 recipe ID10T did with his cranberry sprite recipe.  Simple and easy so I made one of my own.  
Creamy and thick vanilla pudding type of recipe wit darker and forward vanilla notes.  Has a few spicy and nutty notes as well.  Simple recipe, but it meets my vanilla needs.

reviews.text: Brilliant and simple vanilla pudding style recipe. The vanilla has smoky spicy top-notes and the body fills out nicely. P.S. Sometimes I add 1.5% WF Crispy wafer to give it a bite.  Great work mate!
Delicious. A rich and simple vanilla. Thank you.
